Sql.query: insert into st_recabarra( stbarrcodi, strecacodi, barrcodi, stbarrusucreacion, stbarrfeccreacion ) values( :stbarrcodi, :strecacodi, :barrcodi, :stbarrusucreacion, :stbarrfeccreacion )
update st_recabarra set strecacodi = :strecacodi, barrcodi = :barrcodi, stbarrusucreacion = :stbarrusucreacion, stbarrfeccreacion = :stbarrfeccreacion where stbarrcodi = :stbarrcodi
delete from st_dstele_barra where dstelecodi in (select dstelecodi from st_distelectrica where strecacodi = :strecacodi) and barrcodi = :barrcodi

select (select barrnombre from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi = sb.barrcodi) as barrnomb, sb.* from st_recabarra sb left join st_recalculo r on sb.strecacodi = r.strecacodi where sb.strecacodi = :strecacodi order by 1
select stbarrcodi, strecacodi, barrcodi, stbarrusucreacion, stbarrfeccreacion from st_recabarra where stbarrcodi = :stbarrcodi
select (select b.barrnombre from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi = sb.barrcodi) as barrnomb , sb.* from st_recabarra sb where sb.strecacodi = :strecacodi order by 1
